thread.title: Julio Jones’ sensational catch proved that he’s a real-life superhero | For The Win
thread.title_full: Julio Jones’ sensational catch proved that he’s a real-life superhero | For The Win

author: Andrew Joseph
title: Julio Jones’ sensational catch proved that he’s a real-life superhero | For The Win
text:
The Falcons needed help. The Patriots had all the momentum after scoring 17 unanswered points. On second down, Julio Jones did this: Ladies and gentlemen, @JulioJones_11 . 
— NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017 
Seriously, wow. 
In a ridiculous display of body control, Jones made the catch and got both feet in bounds. It was the kind of play that could have saved the Falcons’ Super Bowl chances then and there. But a sack and holding penalty took Atlanta out of field goal range. 
Still, the sports world was in shock of Jones’ catch. 
— LeBron James (@KingJames) February 6, 2017 Wow Julio!!! 
— Hunter Mahan (@HunterMahan) February 6, 2017 Hercules Hercules Hercules
